descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Anthony Davis joins SportsCenter to talk about his 59-point, 20-rebound performance against the Pistons on Sunday night.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Interview (Anthony Davis: Pretty much any shot I took went in) 2016/02/22 ESHEET SC

videos.headline: Davis: Pretty much any shot I took went in
